title: Oracle Data Center Power Outage Disrupts TikTok For Users In US Days After App's High-Stakes Joint Venture Deal
title_zh: 在应用程序达成高风险合资交易后几天，甲骨文数据中心停电导致 TikTok 用户中断
summary: A weather-related power outage at an Oracle Corp. (NYSE:ORCL) data center caused technical disruptions for TikTok's U.S. users days after the app shifted its American operations to new U.S.-led ownership.
summary_zh: 甲骨文公司（纽约证券交易所股票代码：ORCL）数据中心因天气原因停电，导致 TikTok 美国用户的技术中断。几天前，该应用程序将其美国业务转移到美国主导的新所有权之下。

title: Citizens Analyst Report Says Sprinklr (CXM) Could Be a Future Acquisition Target
title_zh: Citizens 分析师报告称 Sprinklr (CXM) 可能成为未来的收购目标
summary: Sprinklr Inc. (NYSE:CXM) is one of the Best Tech Stocks Under $10 to Buy, at least based on a bullish analysis report from Citizens.
summary_zh: Sprinklr Inc.（纽约证券交易所股票代码：CXM）是 10 美元以下最值得买入的科技股之一，至少根据 Citizens 的看涨分析报告来看是这样。

title: Oracle TikTok Deal Recasts Cloud Role And Data Oversight Risks
title_zh: Oracle TikTok 交易重塑了云角色和数据监管风险
summary: Oracle, NYSE:ORCL, has finalized its investment and operational role in a new U.S.-based TikTok joint venture. The agreement expands Oracle's responsibilities for storing and securing TikTok's U.S. user data.
summary_zh: 甲骨文（纽约证券交易所股票代码：ORCL）已敲定其在一家新的美国 TikTok 合资企业中的投资和运营角色。该协议扩大了甲骨文存储和保护 TikTok 美国用户数据的责任。

title: KKR enters $1.4bn deal to sell Goodpack stake back to founding family – report
title_zh: KKR 达成 14 亿美元协议，将 Goodpack 股份出售给创始家族 - 报告
summary: KKR’s decision to divest comes after it explored options for selling the reusable bulk container provider in October 2024.
summary_zh: KKR 在探索 2024 年 10 月出售这家可重复使用散装集装箱供应商的选择后，做出了剥离的决定。

title: Fund-Raising and Dealmaking Will Dominate Private Asset Managers’ Earnings
title_zh: 融资和交易将主导私募资产管理公司的盈利
summary: Blackstone, KKR, Apollo Global Management and Brookfield are getting ready to report quarterly earnings.
summary_zh: Blackstone、KKR、Apollo Global Management 和 Brookfield 正准备报告季度收益。
